law.catch_line: The information statement required under § 14-1904 of this subtitle shall include:...

text.section:
A credit services business required to obtain a license pursuant to § 14-1902 of this subtitle shall include in the information statement required under § 14-1904 of this subtitle:
A statement of the consumer's right to file a complaint pursuant to § 14-1911 of this subtitle;
The address of the Commissioner where such complaints should be filed; and
A statement that a bond exists and the consumer's right to proceed against the bond under the circumstances and in the manner set forth in § 14-1910 of this subtitle.
